channel.title: Hmm..what do i edit?
channel.description:
added a shop when i trade him i disconnect here's his spawn point [code]spawn = 549 3540 9891 0 3541 9891 3538 9890 1 NewNPC[/code] here's his shop under case 17:// second click npc [code]else if (NPCID == 549) { //MoparScape Ownage store. PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 10; //End of MoparScape Ownage store. }[/code] this is karmascape, with all the npcs in varrock, which i added above and below this code
what am i doin wrong? [thinkin it's the autospawn][br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 06:52:05 PM[/size][hr]you're kidding...someone knows!

item.title: Hmm..what do i edit?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

added a shop
when i trade him i disconnect
here’s his spawn point

spawn = 549	3540	9891	0	3541	9891	3538	9890	1	NewNPC

here’s his shop under case 17:// second click npc

else if (NPCID == 549) { //MoparScape Ownage store. PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 10; //End of MoparScape Ownage store. }
this is karmascape, with all the npcs in varrock, which i added above and below this code

what am i doin wrong?
[thinkin it’s the autospawn][br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 06:52:05 PM[/size][hr]you’re kidding…someone knows!
